callout.title: Ecosystem
description: CityKey, Transit Solutions, Smart POS systems, and Gift Cards are seamlessly  integrated into a unified ecosystem that transforms urban living and business  operations. With CityKey, residents can effortlessly access city services, from  public transit to community programs, all through a single, secure platform.  This integration extends to our Transit Solutions, where real-time updates and  easy payment options are just a tap away, ensuring that daily commutes are  not only streamlined but also personalized to each residentâ€™s needs.

existingIssues.bgImageAlt: Background image for Existing issues section

data.h2: Existing Issues in Public Funds Distribution

ul.text: Lack of automated benefit management and a precise, fast electronic payment system.
Errors in benefit distribution due to conflicts of interest with merchants.
Humiliating disclosure of the social status of benefit recipients, such as school children, socially supported residents, and other vulnerable groups.
Use of cash by pupils poses risks to their safety and raises concerns among parents.
